about_the_game:
The magic kingdom’s court magician, Lunaria, is tasked with her allies to investigate a certain ruin. But when the party gets ambushed by some mysterious men, Lunaria’s magic gets stolen and she’s left with no powers!

When it’s discovered that Lunaria’s magic won’t recover naturally, she falls to utter despair. But not all hope is lost. Elder magicians speak of five great magicians and their prized treasures. If Lunaria can get her hands on those treasures, then her magic may recover! To help her friends and save herself, Lunaria ventures off on an adventure unlike any other!

Features:

  • Classic RPG Experience
  • Turn-based Combat
  • Leveling System
  • Skill System
  • Fantasy Setting

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8/8.1/10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 11/10/8
  • Processor: 2+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display. Lag may occur from loading menus or maps. Turn off other programs before running the game.
